languages.text: Маттис Эрэбис верой и правдой служил Вольному Торговцу, став блестящим офицером мостика и настоящим пустотным волком. Он посетил множество систем и миров Простора Коронус, но ему так никогда и не довелось вновь сойти на поверхность родного Даргонуса и увидеть семью.

Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.
languages.original_text: Маттис Эрэбис верой и правдой служил Вольному Торговцу, став блестящим офицером мостика и настоящим пустотным волком. Он посетил множество систем и миров Простора Коронус, но ему так никогда и не довелось вновь сойти на поверхность родного Даргонуса и увидеть семью.

Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis war ein loyaler und pflichtbewusster Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Er entwickelte sich zu einem herausragenden Brückenoffizier und Leerenwolf. Er besuchte viele Systeme und Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung, setzte aber nie einen Fuß auf seine Heimat Dargonus und sah auch seine Familie nie wieder.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis war ein loyaler und pflichtbewusster Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Er entwickelte sich zu einem herausragenden Brückenoffizier und Leerenwolf. Er besuchte viele Systeme und Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung, setzte aber nie einen Fuß auf seine Heimat Dargonus und sah auch seine Familie nie wieder.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis était un serviteur loyal, entièrement dévoué {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Il gravit les échelons et devint un brillant officier de la passerelle doublé d'un authentique loup du cosmos. Il explora de nombreux mondes et systèmes au sein des Étendues de Koronus, mais plus jamais il ne remit les pieds sur sa planète natale de Dargonus ni ne revit sa famille.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis était un serviteur loyal, entièrement dévoué {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Il gravit les échelons et devint un brillant officier de la passerelle doublé d'un authentique loup du cosmos. Il explora de nombreux mondes et systèmes au sein des Étendues de Koronus, mais plus jamais il ne remit les pieds sur sa planète natale de Dargonus ni ne revit sa famille.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis fue un fiel y devoto sirviente de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No tardó en convertirse en un excelente oficial de puente y un verdadero lobo del vacío. Recorrió numerosos sistemas y mundos de la Extensión de Koronus, pero nunca volvió a pisar su Dargonus natal ni a ver a su familia.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis fue un fiel y devoto sirviente de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No tardó en convertirse en un excelente oficial de puente y un verdadero lobo del vacío. Recorrió numerosos sistemas y mundos de la Extensión de Koronus, pero nunca volvió a pisar su Dargonus natal ni a ver a su familia.

languages.text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。彼は優秀なブリッジの士官隣、真のヴォイドウルフになった。彼は、さまざまな星系やコロヌス・エクスパンスの惑星を訪れたが、生まれ故郷であるダルゴナスに足を踏み入れることはなく、家族と再会することもなかった。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

traits.locale_text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。彼は優秀なブリッジの士官隣、真のヴォイドウルフになった。彼は、さまざまな星系やコロヌス・エクスパンスの惑星を訪れたが、生まれ故郷であるダルゴナスに足を踏み入れることはなく、家族と再会することもなかった。

languages.text: 马蒂斯·伊雷比斯一直对行商浪人忠心耿耿。多年后，他升迁到了舰桥，成为了一名杰出的军官，也成为了真正的虚空之狼。他造访了科罗努斯扩区众多星系与世界，但从未回过他的故乡达戈努斯，也没有再与他的家人见过面。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.

traits.locale_text: 马蒂斯·伊雷比斯一直对行商浪人忠心耿耿。多年后，他升迁到了舰桥，成为了一名杰出的军官，也成为了真正的虚空之狼。他造访了科罗努斯扩区众多星系与世界，但从未回过他的故乡达戈努斯，也没有再与他的家人见过面。

languages.text: Mattis Erebis, Hür Tacir'in sadık ve vazifesine bağlı bir hizmetkârıydı. Öne çıkan bir köprü subayı ve hakiki bir uçsuz kurdu olmayı başardı. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki pek çok sistemi ve dünyayı ziyaret etse de bir daha ne yurdu olan Dargonus'a ayak bastı ne de ailesini gördü.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. He went on to become an outstanding bridge officer and a true void wolf. He visited many systems and worlds in the Koronus Expanse, but never set foot on his native Dargonus or saw his family again.
